channel.title: Fishing when walking away how to fix?
channel.description:
So basically when I'm fishing and walk away my character keeps fishing, any one know how to disable that?
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/9229/83805882.jpg[/img]

item.title: Fishing when walking away how to fix?
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

I think in

Packet 98: Walk On Command packet
or your walking packet you need to add something like

if (FishingHandler.fishing) { FishingHandler.fishing = false; }

or something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Fishing when walking away how to fix?
